status.info: We use this protocol and it’s working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"53n57","text":"Turn on electroporator and set to 1.7-2.5 kv (optimize for strain), 200 ohms and 25 µF.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":34,"length":10},{"style":"bold","offset":68,"length":8},{"style":"bold","offset":81,"length":5}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4bkem","text":"Thaw cells   for   or use freshly made cells.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":11,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":17,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"7CAEC2506B8D11EA8782F3F71A7A9277","id":0,"label":"","temperature":"","unit":165}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":600,"guid":"771384706B8D11EA8782F3F71A7A9277","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"97f6d","text":"Add   to the cells in the microcentrifuge tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":4,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"1","guid":"96782B406B8D11EA8782F3F71A7A9277","id":0,"label":"10 pg/µl DNA solution (in DI water)","unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"388p7","text":"Transfer the DNA-cell mixture to the cold cuvette, tap on countertop 2X, wipe water from exterior of cuvette and place in the electroporation module and press pulse (don’t hold the button down).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":166,"length":26}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
